20110114022016.000|20110114022017.000|CC1|1944.

20110114022018.000|20110114022021.000|CC1|CHANGING.

20110114022024.000|20110114022031.000|CC1|WAR.

20110114022037.000|20110114022039.000|CC1|>> SO WHILE HIS CLASSMATES WENT 
20110114022039.000|20110114022041.000|CC1|TO THE PROM, HE WAS IN THE THICK
20110114022041.000|20110114022044.000|CC1|OF THINGS IN THE SOUTH PACIFIC.
